amendment.description: Amendment provides that when conducting an appraisal for purchase or property under the Airport Improvement Program, the appraisal must not consider either the increased or decreased value of the property due to the property's inclusion in a potential project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in part C of House Report 111-126 to provide that when conducting an appraisal for purchase or property under the Airport Improvement Program, the appraisal must not consider either the increased or decreased value of the property due to the property's inclusion in a potential project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (CT) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy (CT) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Murphy (CT).
